remarks: Version of ~ cbvexdva with a dv condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 .  (Contributed by BJ, 16-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-cbvaldvav.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = y ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
bj-cbvexdvav $p |- ( ph -> ( E. x ps <-> E. y ch ) ) $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph x y $.
$d ps y $.
